These results were originally reported in Report on the American Workforce, U.S. Department of Labor, 1995 and will appear in David S. Johnson and Stephanie Shipp, " Inequality and the Business Cycle: A Consumption Viewpoint," forthcoming, Journal of Empirical Economics.
